`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(r.pre,{children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(r.code,{className:"language-jsx",children:`useEffect(() => {
  // \u30C7\u30FC\u30BF\u3092\u53D6\u5F97\u3059\u308B\u51E6\u7406
  const fetchData = async () => {
    const response = await fetch('https://api.example.com/data');
    const data = await response.json();
    setData(data);
  };

  fetchData();
}, []); // \u7A7A\u306E\u4F9D\u5B58\u914D\u5217\u2192\u30DE\u30A6\u30F3\u30C8\u6642\u306E\u307F\u5B9F\u884C

const Parent = () => {
  return <Child name="React" />;
};

// \u5B50\u30B3\u30F3\u30DD\u30FC\u30CD\u30F3\u30C8
const Child = ({ name }) => {
  return <p>Hello, {name}!</p>;
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-705f3664-5df7-44d7-8be5-83ddd56589d9.mdx",lineNumber:70,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-705f3664-5df7-44d7-8be5-83ddd56589d9.mdx",lineNumber:70,columnNumber:1},this),`
